briefTitle: Electronic Medical Record-Based Nudge to Reduce SLNB
officialTitle: An Electronic Medical Record-Based Nudge Intervention to Reduce Low-Value Axillary Surgery in Older Women With ER+ Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Rate of SLNB after nudge deployment into the EHR
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* early-stage (stages I-III) breast cancer
* clinically node-negative
* ER+ and/or PR+, HER2 not-amplified
* non-metastatic at diagnosis

Exclusion Criteria:

* under 70 years of age
* breast cancer is that is not ER+ or PR+
